price: 36. Iyagoo leh: Ma waxaan isaga deynaa ilaahyadayada gabyaa Jinnoole ah?
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ أَئِنَّا لَتَارِكُوٓاْ ءَالِهَتِنَا لِشَاعِرٖ مَّجۡنُونِۭ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna a-innā latārikū ālihatinā lishāʿirin majnūnin
